2. Extract the top audience interests.
3. Search for experts on algorithmic bias.

Give me a moment while I run the necessary tools.

Subject: Invitation to discuss Algorithmic Bias on ‘Ethics in Tech'

Hi Dr. Maya Patel,

I’m Alex Rivera, host of the ‘Ethics in Tech’ podcast where we explore the moral dimensions of emerging technologies. Our upcoming episode, “Uncovering Algorithmic Bias: Challenges & Solutions,” will dive deep into how bias infiltrates AI systems and what can be done to mitigate it.

Given your groundbreaking research on algorithmic fairness at the Center for Data Justice, I believe your insights would be incredibly valuable to our listeners. We’d love to have you join us for a 45‑minute conversation.

Would you be available for a remote interview in the next two weeks? Please let me know a few times that work for you, and we’ll coordinate.

Looking forward to the possibility of featuring your expertise.

Best regards,
Alex Rivera
Host, Ethics in Tech
alex@ethicsintech.com
